mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM QNA_Q WHERE M_NO = #{m_No} ORDER BY Q_DATE DESC ) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM QNA_Q ORDER BY Q_NO DESC) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM QNA_Q WHERE M_NO LIKE '%' || TRIM(#{query}) || '%' WHERE Q_CARTEGORY LIKE '%' || TRIM(#{query}) || '%' WHERE Q_TITLE LIKE '%' || TRIM(#{query}) || '%' WHERE TO_DATE(Q_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(TRIM(#{query}), 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE Q_STATE LIKE '%' || TRIM(#{query}) || '%' ORDER BY Q_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA_Q WHERE M_NO LIKE '%' || TRIM(#{query}) || '%' WHERE Q_CARTEGORY LIKE '%' || TRIM(#{query}) || '%' WHERE Q_TITLE LIKE '%' || TRIM(#{query}) || '%' WHERE TO_DATE(Q_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(TRIM(#{query}), 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE Q_STATE LIKE '%' || TRIM(#{query}) || '%'
